diagnostics.description: log environment info to the console

submit.description:
Submit build archive to App Store Connect
See how to configure submits with eas.json: https://docs.expo.dev/submit/eas-json/

profile.name: profile
profile.description: Name of the submit profile from eas.json. Defaults to "production" if defined in eas.json.

latest.name: latest
latest.description: Submit the latest build for specified platform

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the build to submit

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Always print logs from Submission Service

account:login.description: log in with your Expo account

account:view.description: show the username you are logged in as

branch:create.description: Create a branch on the current project.

json.name: json
json.description: return a json with the new branch ID and name.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the branch to create

branch:delete.description: Delete a branch on the current project

json.name: json
json.description: return JSON with the edited branch's ID and name.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the branch to delete

branch:list.description: List all branches on this project.

json.name: json
json.description: return a json with the edited branch's ID and name.

json.name: json
json.description: return a json with the branch's ID name and recent update groups.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the branch to view

build:configure.description: Configure the project to support EAS Build.

json.name: json
json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

profile.name: profile
profile.description: Name of the build profile from eas.json. Defaults to "production" if defined in eas.json.

auto-submit.name: auto-submit
auto-submit.description: Submit on build complete using the submit profile with the same name as the build profile

auto-submit-with-profile.name: auto-submit-with-profile
auto-submit-with-profile.description: Submit on build complete using the submit profile with provided name

build:inspect.description: Inspect the state of the project at specific build stages. Useful for troubleshooting.

profile.name: profile
profile.description: Name of the build profile from eas.json. Defaults to "production" if defined in eas.json.

stage.name: stage
stage.description:
Stage of the build you want to inspect.
    archive - builds the project archive that would be uploaded to EAS when building
    pre-build - prepares the project to be built with Gradle/Xcode. Does not run the native build.
    post-build - builds the native project and leaves the output directory for inspection

force.name: force
force.description: Delete OUTPUT_DIRECTORY if it already exists.

build:list.description: list all builds for your project

json.name: json
json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

build:view.description: view a build for your project

json.name: json
json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

channel:create.description: Create a channel on the current project.

json.name: json
json.description: print output as a JSON object with the new channel ID, name and branch mapping.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the channel to create

channel:delete.description: Delete a channel on the current project

json.name: json
json.description: Delete a channel on the current project

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the channel to delete

channel:edit.description: Point a channel at a new branch.

branch.name: branch
branch.description: Name of the branch to point to

json.name: json
json.description: print output as a JSON object with the channel ID, name and branch mapping.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the channel to edit

channel:list.description: List all channels on the current project.

json.name: json
json.description: print output as a JSON object with the channel ID, name and branch mapping.

channel:rollout.description: Rollout a new branch out to a channel incrementally.

percent.name: percent
percent.description: percent of traffic to redirect to the new branch

json.name: json
json.description: print output as a JSON object with the new channel ID, name and branch mapping

args.name: channel
args.description: rollout that the channel is on

channel:view.description: View a channel on the current project.

json.name: json
json.description: print output as a JSON object with the channel ID, name and branch mapping.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the channel to view

device:create.description: register new Apple Devices to use for internal distribution

device:delete.description: remove a registered device from your account

device:list.description: list all registered devices for your account

device:view.description: view a device for your project

project:init.description: create or link an EAS project

secret:create.description: Create an environment secret on the current project or owner account.

secret:delete.description:
Delete an environment secret by ID.
Unsure where to find the secret's ID? Run eas secret:list

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the secret to delete

secret:list.description: Lists environment secrets available for your current app

update:configure.description: Configure the project to support EAS Update.

update:delete.description: Delete all the updates in an update Group.

json.name: json
json.description: Return a json with the group ID of the deleted updates.

args.name: groupId
args.description: The ID of an update group to delete.

branch.name: branch
branch.description: Branch to publish the update group on

message.name: message
message.description: A short message describing the update

skip-bundler.name: skip-bundler
skip-bundler.description: Skip running Expo CLI to bundle the app before publishing

json.name: json
json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

auto.name: auto
auto.description: Use the current git branch and commit message for the EAS branch and update message

update:list.description: View the recent updates for a branch

branch.name: branch
branch.description: List all updates on this branch

all.name: all
all.description: List all updates associated with this project

json.name: json
json.description: Return a json with all of the recent update groups.

json.name: json
json.description: Return a json with the updates belonging to the group.

args.name: groupId
args.description: The ID of an update group.

webhook:create.description: Create a webhook on the current project.

event.name: event
event.description: Event type that triggers the webhook

secret.name: secret
secret.description: Secret used to create a hash signature of the request payload, provided in the 'Expo-Signature' header.

webhook:delete.description: Delete a webhook on the current project.

args.name: ID
args.description: ID of the webhook to delete

webhook:list.description: List webhooks on the current project.

event.name: event
event.description: Event type that triggers the webhook

webhook:update.description: Update a webhook on the current project.

event.name: event
event.description: Event type that triggers the webhook

secret.name: secret
secret.description: Secret used to create a hash signature of the request payload, provided in the 'Expo-Signature' header.

webhook:view.description: View a webhook on the current project.

args.name: ID
args.description: ID of the webhook to view
